name: CIMPOR - Indústria de Cimentos
goal:
Ativity: Cement production and trading
The company belongs to InterCement who´s mission is to grow and develop together with customers, employees, suppliers, shareholders and communities, driven by innovation, sustainability and operational excellence.
Its mission is to differentiate itself with its customers by level of partnership and services by 2023, always among the top ten and the five most solid and profitable international companies in the sector.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Transport
